text: KTMN (97.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Cloudcroft, New Mexico. The station is owned by Cloudcroft Broadcasting Corporation. It airs a classic rock format. The station was assigned the KTMN call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on September 17, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * TMN Category:Radio stations established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in New Mexico Category:Classic rock radio stations in the United States Category:Otero County, New Mexico
title: KTMN
